replies.msg:
Dear JUPAS Applicant,



Last year, College of Business at CityU established a new college-based Bachelor of Science in Computational Finance (CFIN) programme. Now, CityU and Columbia University in New York are establishing a joint programme that all second-year CFIN students may apply for. Students admitted to this joint programme will continue their study at Columbia University for another two years and earn two bachelor degrees, a Bsc in CFIN from CityU and a BA in Information Science from Columbia University (subject to approval).

即係入City CFIN就可以拎埋個Columbia嘅degree
22分入ivy league
要最top個1，2個先有得出咋

不得不承認city呢幾年做好多野向上爬
利申：polyu
香港columbia

其實city之前早就已經有同Columbia搞joint degree programme,我之前差d想放棄港大黎入呢個programme
後來我查下先知個joint degree係同Columbia college of General Studies搞，唔係同本部Columbia College搞
Columbia同Columbia CGS個關係就好似hku同hku space/明德咁，差d就俾佢呃咗

Are the courses the same as those taken by students at Columbia's traditional undergraduate colleges?
Yes. GS students take the same courses with the same faculty, are held to the same high standards, and earn the same degree as all other Columbia undergraduates.

https://gs.columbia.edu/admissions-faqs

你搞錯哂 cc同gs 係一齊上堂既 個degree fulfillment都分別唔大 當地學生/employer都唔會覺得兩者有分別

columbia 非專科入面最受歡迎既major分別係financial economics同cs 前者city既business economics可以去讀
依加computational finance去讀既information science 就係類似cs 係美國可以講係最搶手既undergrad major

但係依加joint degree收生只有好少係本地生 所以都係唔好為左columbia揀city
特別係computational finance 讀超多數 本地生一定爛grade
